team.name: Monkey D. Luffy
team.text: I am Monkey D. Luffy, the man who will become the Pirate King!

team.name: Sabo
team.text: Things always have a core. And if you strike it, you can turn any situation around.

team.name: Roronoa Zoro
team.text: You need to accept the fact that youâ€™re not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.

team.name: Gol D. Roger
team.text: I'm Roger! This meeting must be fate, Rayleigh! What do you say to turning the world upside down with me?!!

team.name: Monkey D. Dragon
team.text: There can be no happiness in a world where those deemed unnecessary are weeded out and eliminated...!! One day, I will change this world... you mark my words.
